RelatedSentence: Outrage over Boko Haram 's kidnapping of the school girls has prompted Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan , criticised at home for his government 's slow response to the crisis , to accept US , British and French help in the hunt for the girls .

Outrage over Boko Haram 's kidnapping of the school girls has prompted Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan , criticised at home for his government 's slow response to the crisis , to accept US , British and French help in the hunt for the girls .
US officials have said the effort to retrieve the kidnapped girls is now a top priority .
But it has been complicated by Nigeria 's early reluctance to accept assistance and US rules banning aid to forces that commit human rights abuses .
